casebody.data:
John M. TAYLOR et al. v. STANDARD GAS & ELECTRIC COMPANY et al. No. 1527. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Nov. 29, 1937. Sempliner, Dewey, Stanton & Honig-man, of Detroit, Mich., and Milsten & Mil-sten, of Tulsa, Okl., for appellants. Campbell & Biddison, Gibson & Holle-'man, W. F. .Semple, Edgar A. de Meules, and Ramsey, Martin & Logan, all of Tulsa, Okl., and R. M. Campbell and Sidley, McPherson, Austin & Burgess, all of Chicago, 111., for appellees.

Before LEWIS and PHILLIPS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed November 29, 1937, on application of appellants at appellants’ costs.
